value:
$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Ungh... Mmrgh...$k$pZzz...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Mirabilis, wake UP!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|*yaaaaawn* I'm sorry...$k$pI don't have any idea where
we should go...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|You have nowhere TO go.
Nowhere at all...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Waahh! She's back!$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Oh? A shriek is all the greeting you
have for me? Have you forgotten
what I've done for you?$k$pIf not for me and my brother, you
would not be what you are today.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|...Huh?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Mirabilis. It is hard always being
hungry, isn't it? Always barely awake,
daydreaming of a full belly...$k$pOf course, it isn't your fault. Only
natural when your mother ignored
you once you left her womb.$k$pWhat could you have been to her,
a woman who had no intention of
ever giving birth in the first place?$k$pLittle more than a pebble in her shoe,
I imagine. Fit only to be tossed away.
And troublesome until then.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what... I don't...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Do not fret, Mirabilis. That is not you.
You are something else now. You are
of the same stuff as dreams.$k$pThere is no need to cry.$k$pYou can stay here, living happily
in a lovely dream. A lovely dream
of my all-consuming nightmare.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Still you defy me? Why?
It is useless. Give up.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Hush, now, Mirabilis... Back to sleep.
I remember how you cried and cried,
but no one helped you...don't you?$k$pAll alone... Always alone... Forever.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I... I...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Please, stop! You're hurting her!$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|...You?$k$pSo, you're here too.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Me? What about me?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|The heartless traitor who abandoned
her friends and ran...$k$pYou lived your life away in the real
world, free from care, and forgot all
about your life among the dreams...$k$pLet me help you remember...$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|I... But I...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|So? Do you remember now? Can you
recall your friends from so long ago?$k$pPlay, play, play! C'mon—let's play!$k$pYou would call out to each other
and play for hours and hours...
You remember, don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Do you...know what she's talking
about, Sharena?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|There was a time when the dream
realm faced ruin... If the dreams
died, you mortals would also suffer.$k$pInnocent children were the only way
we could save our home. And so we
called children into the dream realm.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And what happened to them?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Learning of our plight, they drank of
the nectar in order to save our home.$k$pAnd so they gave up their mortal
lives to become something more.
They became álfr.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I can't believe—$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Triandra, Plumeria...$k$pPeony, Mirabilis...$k$pThat is how they came to be who
they are now.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|But, of those girls, only you
remain mortal...$k$pYou sacrificed your friends,
leaving them behind while
you went on alone...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I... I... IiiiiiieeeeeEEYYYAAAGH!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena! Try to keep calm!$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hmhmhm... If it hurts, sleep it off.
Forget it all... Just dream it away...$k$p$Sbs150|
